experience: You and Chris both know Kyle Burnett, Ed Nusbaum, and 186 others
Hey Phoenix locals! Happen to know anyone looking to learn JavaScript or is interested in learning web development?

Galvanize Inc Phoenix now has a FREE online JavaScript Fundamentals course!! Oh wait, it gets better! Every Tuesday they will be hosting in-person studio sessions with the Galvanize Instructors to go over questions from that week.
Feel free to tag anyone who may be interested & click the link in the comments to sign up and get on the list.
And for question, reach out to Chris Huie!

I build communities around technology and start-up culture

-Take on key roles and project leadership on both Business Intelligence and Finance teams.-Built FP&A tools with technologies such as SQL, Excel, Amazon Redshift, and Python that were integrated with vendor APIs such as Netsuite and Salesforce.-Built and prepare monthly variance explanations and accompanying package.-Prepare rolling monthly forecasts and model alternative business scenarios.

-Built in month prediction algorithms using natural exponential decay and multiple regression analysis utilizing Python and ultimately implemented in Excel PowerPivot with connection strings directly to our internal SQL Server.

-Modeled future and expected growth rates by building a fully automated application with SQL, VBA, PowerPivot, and PowerQuery. -Automated third party data flows using JavaScript, VBA, Selenium, and SSIS.-Created applications to calculate key revenue and COGS drivers.-Detailed multiple customer personas to more effectively segment and target marketing efforts around this concept. -Built real-time dashboard applications in Excel that tracks highly detailed information, while being designed in a way that is easily digestible for higher level executives who need a broad scope.
